- - - - Clean Clean false false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi David, Thanks so much – we are looking forward to working with you again too. The only notaries I know about are the ones we collect for this list. <http://www.mbopartners.com/notaries> Have a great night!Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: David Smith [mailto:david_t_smith@hotmail.com <mailto:david_t_smith@hotmail.com>] Sent: Monday, January 14, 2013 3:59 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: can we do a "SOW" contract (i.e. not hourly) thanks so much I will forward a message to introduce you looking forward to working with MBO again by the way, do you have any notary people that are in the San Jose CA area that have done an I-9 for any of your contractors recently?From: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> To: david_t_smith@hotmail.com <mailto:david_t_smith@hotmail.com> Subject: RE: can we do a "SOW" contract (i.e. not hourly) Date: Mon, 14 Jan 2013 20:56:18 +0000Hi Dave, I am so sorry I missed your call. Would be the contact, please introduce to the client and I will provide them with everything they need. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde%40mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCf1BPvENJ/8OKL6D5lxXIdYylurVxR/Tp36VUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCf1BPvENJ/8OKL6D5lxXIdYylurVxR/Tp36VUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCf1BPvENJ/8OKL6D5lxXIdYylurVxR/Tp36VUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> to MBO Partners! From: David Smith [mailto:david_t_smith@hotmail.com <mailto:david_t_smith@hotmail.com>] Sent: Monday, January 14, 2013 3:47 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: can we do a "SOW" contract (i.e. not hourly) thanks so much, I am trying to reach you. Any way you can call me at 408-569-2910 when you have a moment i will try to finish the I-9 and get it notarized today in the mean time the contact from ProCom would like to start working with my representative from MBO Partners to get a copy of letters of incorporation and other documentation to get the ball rolling. Are you the main contact for this or is it someone else? PLease let me know if we can move forward with him while I get my I-9 worked out.
Thank you
_DaveFrom: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde%40mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCf1BPvENJ/8OKL6D5lxXIdYylurVxR/Tp36VUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> To: david_t_smith@hotmail.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:david_t_smith%40hotmail.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCf1BPvENJ/8OKL6D5lxXIdYylurVxR/Tp36VUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Subject: RE: can we do a "SOW" contract (i.e. not hourly) Date: Mon, 14 Jan 2013 20:41:36 +0000Hi Dave, Yes, we sure do. From: David Smith [mailto:david_t_smith@hotmail.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:david_t_smith%40hotmail.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCf1BPvENJ/8OKL6D5lxXIdYylurVxR/Tp36VUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>] Sent: Monday, January 14, 2013 1:07 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: can we do a "SOW" contract (i.e. not hourly) Hi Sara
My potential client wants to do a SOW contract where instead of billing hourly we biill when milestones are reached. Does MBO Partners support this method of billing?
-Dave
